title: Introducing: SinceYou
content:
Boston/LA quartet SinceYou have seemingly appeared out of nowhere, with their stunning debut EP, simply titled I.

Put onto my radar by CitR contributor Ian (aka The Unloved Kids), it’s perfectly formed, R&B indebted indie. Comparison wise, there’s elements of Aussie outfit Tora, and perhaps even LA hip-pop giants The Neighbourhood. From the stunning EP opener Barefoot, to the Ava Trilling featuring Lela Bells, it’s one of the most exciting debut EP’s of 2014. Stream it in full below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
